visual_desc: INT. LAMP ROOM - CONTINUOUS. <Sarah> (female, late 40s, short brown hair, wearing loose-fitting clothes) manages to stabilize the lamp. The beam shines brightly through the storm. She leans against the mechanism, exhausted. <Gus> (medium-sized, scruffy mixed-breed dog) is next to her. The lamp mechanism is in the center of the frame.
variation_reason: The camera slightly zooms in on the scene, and the middle-aged woman's action of stabilizing the lamp results in minimal changes in composition.

To the left, a middle-aged woman (short brown hair, wearing loose-fitting clothes) is stabilizing the lamp. Beside the woman is a medium-sized, scruffy mixed-breed dog. The beam from the lamp is shining brightly, cutting through the storm visible through the windows. The overall lighting is bright due to the lamp's powerful beam.

Beside her, the medium-sized, scruffy mixed-breed dog remains by her side. The lamp continues to shine brightly through the storm.
